column4: anyone know why my xchat sounds dont work but i have audio other places?
even when i click play on a sound file in the xchat sound preferences i have no sound
if you start xchat from a terminal window, then do the play sound thing, do any errors appear in the terminal
IndyGunFreak, i dont know how to do either one
for 'Beep',  put this where it says sound file, then click play:   /usr/share/sounds/purple/alert.wav
